inclusion.criterion: The subject is 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 48 M with a h/o HTN hyperlipidemia, bicuspid aortic valve...

inclusion.criterion: The subject has bi-leaflet aortic valve morphology
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: severe aortic stenosis with underlying bicuspid aortic valve

inclusion.criterion: The subject has documented aortic valve disease which may or may not include: Aortic valve insufficiency
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The subject needs correction of BAV annular dilatation in patients with chronic AI and dilated annulus
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: All patients will be excluded who require emergency surgery for any reason.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: The subject's aortic valve morphology is not bicuspid.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: severe aortic stenosis with underlying bicuspid aortic valve

notes: Unknown: EF was 25%, which is below the exclusion criterion of <35%. However, this may be due to severe aortic stenosis and not necessarily a contraindication for the trial.
